name: HEFE
description: $HEFE is a community-driven, tokenized brand on the Avalanche blockchain that blends the viral appeal of memecoins with real-world utility, financial innovation, and long-term vision. Represented by the iconic walrus, $HEFE goes beyond memes—focusing on sustainability, ecosystem integration, DeFi incentives, and creating lasting value for holders. It’s not just a token—it’s a movement with purpose, culture, and a rapidly growing community committed to reshaping what memecoins can truly represent in Web3.
